short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily pick any color on the screen, view a history of picked colors, and copy or clear them with a single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This color picker chrome extension is the perfect tool for designers and developers. With one easy click, you can select any color on the screen, view a history of picked colors, and copy or clear them with a single click. This extension also allows you to view a history of the colors you have picked and saved, giving you quick access to the colors you need. And with the ability to copy and clear colors with just one click, you can quickly make changes to your work without having to painstakingly search for the perfect color. Get this extension and make color selection effortless!
